title: Futbol Americas: Mexican Football Federation cleans house
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar are joined by Mauricio Pedroza to discuss the Mexican Football Federation cleaning house after national team struggles. Did Sporting Director Gerardo Torrado deserve to get fired? Then the guys react to the MLS All-Star Game roster. Which players were snubbed? Then USSF President Cindy Parlow Cone joins the show for an exclusive interview. The former USWNT player talks about the USSF equal pay agreement with the USMNT and USWNT, NWSL scandals and expectations for Qatar 2022.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: FMF fires General Sporting Director Gerardo Torrado, among others
